messages: b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:19): 0727cf52ad9f560d45e18372943ed695: yes we're getting to the point where we'd remove erroneous testcases unless they absolutely have to be fixed
b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:21): bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65: my opinion is the same. we shouldn't change the spec. this is implemented incorrectly
b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:21): TabAtkins: it's implemented incorrectly the same by everyone
0a6e04acaaef9f5ff2575f489d8c421d (19:21): my regrets.  I have a conflicting call. But I'll stay on IRC...
b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:22): TabAtkins: the change is a matter of making the model described in the spec match reality

17f9b78129866dff3cbd228a8d985fbf (19:25): 104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01, listening for 10 seconds I heard sound from the following: TabAtkins (29%), bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 (19%), howcome (49%)
b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:27): 104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01: the change I had made that caused regressions was anologous to these rules but not directly related to them
b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:27): johnjan: IE9 now passes these testcases so we should investigate the actual compat impact first
b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:28): johnjan: I'd rather assert a regression tail before changing the spec
b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:28): (johnjan will try to get compat data to discuss at TPAC)
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (19:28): https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=472252 was the bug I had the next day when I broke one of these cases
b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:29): 4cbb83f99f9692df31c8fae4c989556f: I haven't had time to update these.
b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:29): 4cbb83f99f9692df31c8fae4c989556f: the prose edits have already improved clarity substantially
b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:30): 0727cf52ad9f560d45e18372943ed695,ChrisL: not worth waiting for then. Resolved.
b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:30): bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65: I like the text; it's clearer than the current version

b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:31): bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65: I have suggested minor improvements; box and elements are often mentioned in the same sentence without distinguishing them. The things that adjoin are boxes, the things that are siblings are the elements
b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:32): bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 discusses the wording described in his review)
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (19:34): I suggested making "adjoining" not transitive in http://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/www-style/2010Jul/0507.html
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (19:35): but it's technically ok either way; just a matter of how we define the terms
0a6e04acaaef9f5ff2575f489d8c421d (19:36): seems odd that A can adjoin B while B does not adjoin A
b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:36): (discussion of adjoining margin definition that the scribe cannot keep up with)
3c80caea4fc75cdb123c6dd216fb70ae (19:38): has to take off now. Bye!

b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:41): 3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d: I like bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65's suggested changes; but I think the way the terms adjoining and collapse are currently defined is fine
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (19:46): >   | A collapsed margin is considered adjoining to another margin if
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (19:46): >   | any of its component margins is adjoining to that margin.
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (19:46): ACTION 3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d: write example to clarify this
22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (19:46): noticed an ACTION. Trying to create it.
22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (19:46): Created ACTION-270 - Write example to clarify this [on Elika Etemad - due 2010-11-03].

b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:46): ACTION: 3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d to write a spec example to clarify that a collapsed margin is considered adjoining to another maring if any of its component margin is adjoining to that margin
22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (19:46): noticed an ACTION. Trying to create it.

22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (19:46): Created ACTION-271 - Write a spec example to clarify that a collapsed margin is considered adjoining to another maring if any of its component margin is adjoining to that margin [on Elika Etemad - due 2010-11-03].
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (19:46): RESOLVED: Proposal accepted for CSS2.1 Issue 159 with bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65's "no padding or margin areas" change and "drop 'vertical'" changes
b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:47): my phone dropped the call
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (19:48): I would suggest s/auto position/static position/
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (19:49): And replace "the top of the box in the vertical direction, and the same position horizontally that" with "the same as"
b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:49): RESOLVED: Proposal accepted for CSS2.1 Issue 199
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (19:49): Since it's zero-height, it doesn't matter.
69745a07a14c658a254dfe2c0222a0a4 (19:50): 0a6e04acaaef9f5ff2575f489d8c421d I don't think that follows from non-transitivity...
b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:50): bddfdb28870c5800d938fa0993c46d65 and Tab discuss the change's exact insertion point in the spec)
0a6e04acaaef9f5ff2575f489d8c421d (19:51): I am not awake. Don't worry. I am trying to be reflexive and failing
b0faf0091b8793353bfd62455a3bedf2 (19:51): 0727cf52ad9f560d45e18372943ed695: please email your items, review the wiki and update as necessary
0a6e04acaaef9f5ff2575f489d8c421d (19:52): A adjoins B, B adjoins C, but A does not adjoin C, right? Still seems odd
